61.eng-name: Virtues and Merits of the Prophet (pbuh) and his Companions

hadiths.text: Narrated Abu Huraira:Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) said, "My similitude in comparison with the other prophets before me, is that of a man who has built a house nicely and beautifully, except for a place of one brick in a corner. The people go about it and wonder at its beauty, but say: 'Would that this brick be put in its place!' So I am that brick, and I am the last of the Prophets

chapter.ara-name: باب خَاتِمِ النَّبِيِّينَ صلى الله عليه وسلم
chapter.eng-name: The last of all the Prophets (Muhammad (ﷺ))
